Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2024-716: Important priority package update for microcode_ctl
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2023-49141:
	Improper isolation in some Intel(R) Processors stream cache mechanism may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
